item.title: Indie Game Awards 2024 – Every Winner Announced
item.content:encoded:
https://insider-gaming.com/indie-game-awards-2024-every-winner-announced/

The inaugural Indie Game Awards presented by Six One Indie took place on Thursday night (December 19), and with it came 20 awards and honors given out to some of the best indie games and studios of 2024.

You can see all of the Indie Game Awards winners below along with the various nominees if relevant. In addition to listing the winners, you can watch each specific segment as well. If you want to watch the full show, you can do so below or on the official Six One Indie channel.

The Indie Game Awards 2024 Winners

  • 1000xRESIST
  • Animal Well
  • ARCO
  • Balatro – WINNER
  • Crypt Custodian
  • Lorelei and the Laser Eyes
  • Mouthwashing
  • Neva
  • Nine Sols
  • UFO 50

The Mohammad Fahmi Storyteller Award
